# tf.contrib.model_pruning.get_weight_sparsity

Get sparsity of the weights.

``` python
tf.contrib.model_pruning.get_weight_sparsity()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Args:

None



#### Returns:

A list containing the sparsity of each of the weight tensors
